name: Doggy Lock-Go!
description:
A or D to move Space to Jump, Q to lock objects, press R to restart the Level.

The alien doggy is stranded on a strange planet! But not to worry. Because the doggy can "join" objects together with her mind, making them ignore the rules of physics! 

Help the doggy reach the flags, but watch out for spikes and water, as she likes neither!

Made together with Ackrad (https://ackrad.itch.io/).

Thanks to https://www.kenney.nl/ for some assets.

Thanks to https://www.bensound.com/ for background music.

Made for the GMTK Gamejam 2021.
